meanings.definition: A type of ancient Egyptian tomb.
meanings.sent1: Archaeologists discovered mastabas while exploring the desert.
meanings.sent2: The mastabas in the valley held the remains of pharaohs.
meanings.sent3: The tourists were surprised to find out that mastabas were actually ancient tombs.
meanings.sent4: The mastabas stood like silent guardians of the past.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the mastabas told stories of the afterlife.

meanings.sent1: The archaeologists found many mastabas during the excavation.
meanings.sent2: The mastabas were carefully studied by experts in Egyptology.
meanings.sent3: The children were excited to learn about mastabas in their history lesson.
meanings.sent4: The mastabas dotted the landscape, reminding us of ancient traditions.
meanings.sent5: The grandeur of the mastabas left visitors in awe of the ancient Egyptians.
